name: The dice's Casino
description:
Welcome to the Dices casino,

Where you and your friends were ripped off because at the end of the day luck isn't fair. D 100 the owner of the casino knew that fact and is making thousands of other loose money you and your friends must defeat him.

Controls:

      Pawn : Base form

Hotkey 1

WASD o r Arrow keys - Movement

      Rook: Dash attack

Hotkey 2

WASD o r Arrow keys - Charge attack + direction

       Bishop: Heals

Hotkey 3

       Horse: Jump attack

Hotkey 4

WASD or Arrowkeys or Mouse to aim

Space or Left click to jump
